title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it returns a response with HTTP code 200 OK and no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it returns a response with HTTP code 200 OK and no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: The expected behavior is that if no webapps are deployed on the Tomcat 7 instance and a URL is accessed, it should return an HTTP error 404.
SR: The issue can be resolved by ensuring that when no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL on the Tomcat 7 instance should return an HTTP error 404, instead of a response with HTTP code 200 OK and no content.
